mapper.select: select p.authority from bms_permission p left join bms_role_permission rp on p.permission_id=rp.permission_id left join bms_user_role ur on ur.role_id=rp.role_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and p.deleted=0 and rp.deleted=0 and ur.deleted=0 order by p.sort
select authority from bms_permission where deleted=0
